definition: déjà vu
already/since/both... (and...)
to look at/to regard/to inspect
old variant of 視|视[shi4]
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: They now believe déjà vu is not like predicting the future.
sentences.chinese: 他们现在相信既视感跟预知未来不一样。

sentences.english: When déjà vu occurs, an experience skips going into your short-term memory.
sentences.chinese: 既视感发生时，某个经验省略了进入短期记忆的阶段。
